That's my thing with it. I don't care so much what it says, only that I can=
 prove that I did get a real response. If whatever I get is accurate inform=
ation, all the better, but not the point.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: Zack Widup 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August =
18, 2009 3:12 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I dont think name calling is =
aceptible


    
  Still, you gotta admit it's fascinating that you're gett=
ing anything at all, even if it's BS.

  Zack


  On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 3=
:35 PM, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

      

    S=
ame old stuff, one's opinion is absolute gospel, and if I, or anyone points=
 out the facts we are just the worst bastards that ever lived!

    I've to=
ld everyone for years that asking questions results in unreliable informatr=
ion, and when I asked questions to try to get more information I got pure B=
S. But since that contradicts all the real box experts out there, who insis=
t that they alone know how to ask the right qquestions, and I must be somki=
nd of idiot moron. I just invented this crap, how could I possibly understa=
nd how it works!? No, leave that to some duffus that assembles messages to =
be the real expert. 

    At least I'm honest enough to tell people I tried=
 the "asccepted" method of box use and it's crap. 

    frank-S 



    ---=
 In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, John Brill <jba5656@...> wrote:

ck,

ause you are a person who started this forum that you have the rite to insu=

ry one or is it just a few people can say what they want and others will be=

    > 
    > I said I did not meen to insult anyone but I feel the=
re is an injustuce here and favoratsm wich is wrong in any group.
    > 
  =

matter what. if you aply this thinking to every thing we would be living in=
 a world were people were in prison for doing a crime and the people in gov=
erment could do as they please to sell drugs or kill or whatever and get aw=
ay with it.
    > 
    > we should not have to be USED TO someone who can a=
kt and insult who ever he wants too when ever he wants too.
    >

at is my opinion.
    > pleese forgive my english.
